mapper.select: SELECT m.*, ( SELECT p.menu_name FROM sys_menu p WHERE p.menu_id = m.parent_id ) AS parentName FROM sys_menu m ORDER BY m.order_num ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} order by order_num asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( parent_id, menu_name, url, permission, menu_type, icon, order_num ) VALUES( #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{url}, #{permission}, #{menuType}, #{icon}, #{orderNum} )
